comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: OP, I appreciate your initiative in trying to compile a list of the best casinos, but I have my doubts about whether it is possible to create a completely unbiased and objective list. There are so many factors that can influence someone's opinion, such as personal preferences and experiences. What one person considers to be a "good" casino may not be the same for another, and I doubt that you can find many members (if any) who have experience with ALL casinos. In my opinion, a more appropriate title for your casino list would be "most popular" rather than "best casino". This change would better reflect the content of your list while acknowledging the subjectivity inherent in such rankings.In addition, I would recommend sorting the list of candidates alphabetically. This would make it easier for readers to navigate the list and avoid duplication of entries. Furthermore, since there may be casinos with similar names, it might be helpful to include their full domain names to minimize confusion.Finally, I suggest that you limit your list to only those casinos that have a presence on this forum, such as an official ANN thread. Including only such casinos would ensure that you consider only reputable and established platforms that are already well-known and respected within this community.
